== Securely Wipe a drive ==

Low - Zero-out a drive. Write 0's onto every block on the hard disk.
<pre>
sudo dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/sdb bs=4K
</pre>

Med - Scans disk to detect an early failure and overwrites with random data. Takes Hours.
<pre>
sudo badblocks -c 10240 -s -w -t random -v /dev/sdb
</pre>

Paranoid - Secure but long method to fill the disk with random binary bits. Takes Days.
<pre>
sudo dd if=/dev/urandom of=/dev/sdb bs=4K
sudo dd if=/dev/random of=/dev/sdb bs=4K
</pre>
